lead_paragraph: A Denver judge has raised bail to $1 million cash for a Honduran man charged in a fatal hit-and-run to make sure he is not deported before the state case is resolved.
snippet: A Denver judge has raised bail to $1 million cash for a Honduran man charged in a fatal hit-and-run to make sure he is not deported before the state case is resolved....

headline.main: Oklahoma's Westbrook Thinks Mixon Should Be at NFL Combine
